Topic.Title: Quest Gamebook mode - No objects option?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi
Can someone please tell me the easiest way to create and use objects in Quest gamebook mode?

Or is the text adventure version of Quest easier to use?
It at least has a GUI Object option.

I've been trying on and off to get into making some kind of text adventure (text or mouse operated), but I find most creators very  confusing when it comes to anything more than adding locations lol.

Thanks
